### <a name="proofpoint"></a>`proofpoint`

== Class: proofpoint

This class is able to install or remove proofpoint on a node.

[Add description - What does this module do on a node?]

=== Parameters
=== Authors

##### <a name="-proofpoint--fromaddress"></a>`fromaddress`

Data type: `String`

The email address that shows up in FROM: header.

Default value: `'from-nobody@example.com'`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--toaddress"></a>`toaddress`

Data type: `String`

The REPLY-TO: address

Default value: `'to-nobody@example.com'`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--listeners"></a>`listeners`

Data type: `Array[Hash]`

A Hash of listeners

Default value:

```puppet
[
    { 'port' => 25,  'type' => 'SMTP' },
    { 'port' => 587, 'type' => 'SMTP' },
    { 'port' => 465, 'type' => 'SMTP' },
  ]
```

##### <a name="-proofpoint--package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `String[1]`

The name of the RPM package to be installed.

Default value: `'ser-connector'`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--service_name"></a>`service_name`

Data type: `String[1]`

The name of the service to be managed.

Default value: `'ser-connector'`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `Enum['absent', 'installed']`

Whether or not to install the package.

Default value: `'installed'`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--service_ensure"></a>`service_ensure`

Data type: `Enum['running', 'stopped']`

Ensure the client is started/stopped/running, etc.

Default value: `'running'`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--service_enable"></a>`service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`

Enable the client on reboot.  true/false

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--storebounces"></a>`storebounces`

Data type: `Boolean`

Should bounced email be stored locally for future reference?

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--storebounces_path"></a>`storebounces_path`

Data type: `String`

The path where bounded email will be stored locally.

Default value: `'/var/spool/cmgw/nondeliver'`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--forwardemail"></a>`forwardemail`

Data type: `Boolean`

TODO

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-proofpoint--tlsmode"></a>`tlsmode`

Data type: `String`

TODO

Default value: `'forced TLS'`
